subject: Important Announcement
body: Dear all, please be informed that there will be a company-wide meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Attendance is mandatory.

subject: Invitation to a Party
body: Hi everyone, I'm hosting a party this weekend at my place. You're all invited! Please RSVP by Thursday if you can make it. Looking forward to seeing you there.

subject: Project Update
body: Team, we've made significant progress on the project. Please review the latest updates on the shared drive and provide your feedback by the end of the day.

subject: Payment Reminder
body: Hello, this is a gentle reminder that your payment for the invoice sent last week is due in two days. Please ensure timely payment to avoid any late fees.

subject: Congratulations!
body: Dear Jane, I wanted to personally congratulate you on your recent promotion. Well done! Your hard work and dedication have paid off. Keep up the great work!

subject: Exclusive Offer Inside
body: Hi there, as a valued customer, we're offering you an exclusive discount of 20% on your next purchase. Don't miss out on this limited-time offer. Use the code "SUMMER20" at checkout.

subject: Account Security Alert
body: Dear user, we have noticed some unusual activity on your account. To ensure the security of your account, please reset your password immediately by clicking the provided link.

subject: New Product Launch
body: Hello, we're excited to announce the launch of our latest product. It's a game-changer! Check out our website for more information and take advantage of the introductory offer.

subject: Monthly Newsletter
body: Hi, it's time for our monthly newsletter. In this edition, we'll be sharing the latest industry trends, helpful tips, and exciting updates from our company. Enjoy!

subject: Limited Stock Alert
body: Hurry! Our best-selling item is almost out of stock. Don't miss your chance to grab it before it's gone. Visit our website or contact our sales team to place your order.
